description: A customizable menu item component used to display the item portion of a menu

properties.name: checkbox
properties.description: If true, renders a checkbox at the start of the menu item.

properties.name: customClass
properties.description: Custom CSS class to apply to the li element.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: The disabled state of the menu item.

properties.name: label
properties.description: The text rendered in the menu item.

properties.name: startIcon
properties.description: The modus icon name to render on the start of the menu item.

properties.name: selected
properties.description: The selected state of the menu item.

properties.name: focused
properties.description: The focused state of the menu item.

properties.name: size
properties.description: The size of the menu item.

properties.name: subLabel
properties.description: The text rendered beneath the label.

properties.name: tooltipContent
properties.description: The tooltip text to display when hovering over the menu item.

properties.name: tooltipPosition
properties.description: The position of the tooltip relative to the menu item.

properties.name: value
properties.description: The unique identifying value of the menu item.

properties.name: hasSubmenu
properties.description: Whether this menu item has a collapsible submenu. When true, the item will show a caret and handle toggle behavior.

events.name: itemSelect
events.description: Event emitted when a menu item is selected.

methods.name: collapseSubmenu
methods.description: Public method to collapse the submenu if it's expanded

scripts.title: Basic Usage
scripts.code: <modus-wc-menu-item bordered="example-bordered" checkbox="example-checkbox" disabled="example-disabled" startIcon="example-startIcon" selected="example-selected" focused="example-focused" subLabel="example-subLabel" tooltipContent="example-tooltipContent" hasSubmenu="example-hasSubmenu"></modus-wc-menu-item>

scripts.title: Calling Methods
